```{r}
library(tidyverse)  # include packages 
library(gt)

```


```{r}
classes <- c("Other vegetation","Iceplant","Non-vegetation")
# these are the columns of the confusion matrix
c1 <- c(170, 51, 15)  # ref column other veg.
c2 <- c(1, 137, 1)    # ref column iceplant
c3 <- c(20, 11, 85)   # ref column non-veg

# this is the total of points sampled per class
c5 <- c(200, 199, 110)

df <- data.frame(classes, c1, c2, c3,c5)
print(df)
```


```{r}

# CONFUSION MATRIX TABLE

df %>%
  gt(rowname_col = "classes") %>% 
#gt() %>% 
  cols_label(
    c1 = md("Other vegetation"),
    c2 = md("Iceplant"),
    c3 = md("Non-vegetation"),
    c5 = md("Total")) %>%  
  summary_rows(
    columns = c("c1", "c2", "c3", "c5"),
    fns = list(Total = ~sum(.))) %>% 
  tab_row_group(label = "Map class",
                rows = 1:3) %>% 
    tab_spanner(
    label = "Reference class",
    columns = c("c1","c2","c3")) %>% 
  tab_header(
    title = "Table X",
    subtitle = "Confusion matrix for the assessment sample classification (ground validated points)"
  ) %>% 
 tab_style(
  style = list(
   cell_text(
    align = "left"
   )
  ),
  locations = list(
   cells_title(groups = "title")
  )
 ) 
     
```


```{r}
### accuracy table : columns by class
user <- c(85, 68.84, 77.27)
user_conf <- c(4.94, 6.42, 7.83)
prod <- c(80.82, 66.84, 88.38)
prod_conf <- c(6.87, 33.33, 3.42)

df2 <- data.frame(classes, user, user_conf, prod, prod_conf)
print(df2)
```


```{r}
df2 %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  cols_label(
    classes = "Map class",
    user = md("User acc. (%)"),
    user_conf = md("User acc. 95% conf. interval (%)"),
    prod = md("Prod. acc (%)"),
    prod_conf = md("Prod acc. 95% conf. interval (%)")) %>%  
  tab_header(
    title = "Table X",
    subtitle = "Assessment metrics per class of the 2020 iceplant location map on the Santa Barbara County Coast"
  ) %>% 
 tab_style(
  style = list(
   cell_text(
    align = "left"
   )
  ),
  locations = list(
   cells_title(groups = "title"),
   cells_title(groups = "subtitle")   
  )
 ) %>% 
   tab_source_note(
    source_note = md("Overal accuracy = 85.19% Â± 3.6% (95% confidence interval)")
  )
```
